name: Drop Fruit (Virtual Nomad)
description:
Connect 3 or more, vertically or horizontally. 

Double and Triple Bonuses for 4 and 5 in a row/column.

[Space] to Restart | Any Hi Score will be saved.

consider this "easy mode" to allow players to evaluate for the jam. it will be slightly more difficult when i return to this, post-jam, and add a few things (like save high score, which i just snuck in).

not enough time to publish an HTML version before the Jam deadline, tho. 

i'll get to it :)
